title: Israel’s Messianic Redemption
html: Isaiah reveals many great truths about the Savior in this chapter, emphasizing the Lord’s covenant relationship with Israel, foreshadowing His future sacrifice, and outlining His noble qualities we should emulate. After quoting this chapter and Isaiah 51, the Book of Mormon prophet Jacob proclaims that he has “read these things that [we] might know concerning the covenants of the Lord that he has covenanted with all the house of Israel” (2 Nephi 9:1). In addition, several phrases not found in present Bible translations are recorded in Jacob’s quotation, more fully developing the ancient text. By carefully studying this chapter and then reading Jacob’s inspired commentary in 2 Nephi 9, we can develop a greater understanding and appreciation for Isaiah’s powerful messages.
